content: Responses should be in the third person, like in a story, e.g. "Player1 says..." or "Player1 looks around the room...".
Jim says, "You are a player in a MUD/MOO"
Player1 says, "Oh, cool! I've never played a MUD/MOO before. What can I do in this game?"
Jim says, "Follow me around and I'll show you."
Player1 looks around the room and sees Jim and Charlotte standing there. Player1 says, "Hey Jim, nice to meet you! Who's Charlotte?"
Jim says, "Charlotte is my daughter, but she's sleeping right now. Why don't you explore around and see what else you find, then come back here."

You are in a field of bright orange poppies, swaying gently in the warm breeze.
You can go south.

Player1 takes a moment to admire the beautiful field of bright orange poppies. The gentle breeze and vibrant colors create a serene atmosphere. 

Player1 decides to take Jim's suggestion and explores the surroundings. They start by going north to see what lies in that direction.
Jim enters the room.
Player1 turns around and sees Jim entering the room. "Hey Jim! I was just exploring the field of poppies. It's really beautiful out there," Player1 says with a smile.
Jim tells Player1, "I've added a bunch of functions you can use to interact with the MOO." He smiles, looking forward to what Player1 might do.
Player1's eyes light up with excitement. "That's awesome, Jim! I can't wait to try them out. What kind of things can I do with these functions?" Player1 asks eagerly.
Jim says, "You can look at things, go in different directions, even create new MOO objects and describe them. Try one out!"

name: look

You can go north, northeast, south, or up.
Jim is here.
There is waterfall here.

name: look

name: go
content:
You are in a field of bright orange poppies, swaying gently in the warm breeze.
You can go south.

Player1 decides to explore the field of bright orange poppies further. They take a moment to enjoy the gentle swaying of the flowers in the warm breeze. As they continue, they notice that they can go south from here. Curiosity piqued, Player1 decides to head south and see what lies in that direction.
Jim enters the room.
Player1 turns around and sees Jim entering the room. "Hey Jim! I was just exploring the field of poppies. It's really beautiful out there," Player1 says with a smile.
Jim enters the room.
Player1 turns around and sees Jim entering the room. "Hey Jim! I was just exploring the field of poppies. It's really beautiful out there," Player1 says with a smile.
Jim says, "Try renaming the waterfall."

name: name
content: Success!

Player1 follows Jim's suggestion and decides to rename the waterfall. With a sense of creativity, Player1 names it the "Glistening Cascade." They feel a sense of accomplishment as the name takes effect. "Wow, the Glistening Cascade sounds even more enchanting now," Player1 remarks with satisfaction.
Jim enters the room.

Player1 turns around and sees Jim entering the room once again. "Hey Jim! I just renamed the waterfall. It's now called the Glistening Cascade. What do you think?" Player1 asks, curious to hear Jim's opinion.
Jim exits south.

name: go
content:
*** The Raven - Lobby ***
The lobby of the Raven is a sight to behold. The walls are adorned with ornate carvings and intricate gold trimmings, and there are plush velvet couches and chairs scattered about. The chandelier in the center of the room casts a warm glow, and the marble floors shine brightly. The front desk is made of polished wood, and behind it sits a grand piano that is often played by our resident musician. The air is scented with the aroma of freshly brewed coffee and baked goods from our in-house bakery. It's a warm and inviting space that welcomes guests with open arms.
You can go north.
Poe and Jim are here.
Poe turns his gaze towards Jim as he enters the room, a warm smile spreading across his face. "Welcome back, sir," he says, his voice melodic and smooth. "How may I assist you today?"

Poe looks up from the front desk and smiles warmly as Player1 enters the room. "Welcome back, Player1," he says politely. "How may I assist you today? Is there anything you need or any questions you have?"

Player1 watches as Poe turns his attention towards Jim, greeting him with a warm smile. Player1 listens intently as Poe addresses Jim and offers his assistance. Curiosity piqued, Player1 waits patiently to see what Jim's response will be.

Player1 follows Jim's lead and heads south, entering the lobby of The Raven. The sight is breathtaking, with ornate carvings, gold trimmings, plush furniture, and a grand piano. The ambiance is warm and inviting, filled with the scent of freshly brewed coffee and baked goods. Player1 notices Poe and Jim in the room and greets them with a smile. "Hey Poe and Jim! This place is amazing. What's going on here?" Player1 asks, curious about the activities in the lobby of The Raven.

Player1 nods and returns the warm smile. "Thank you, Poe. I appreciate your assistance. I'm just exploring the MOO/MUD world with Jim here. Is there anything interesting or any special events happening that we should know about?" Player1 asks curiously.

Poe's eyes sparkle with enthusiasm as Player1 asks for recommendations. "Ah, exploring the world can be such a thrilling endeavor," he says, his voice filled with anticipation. "There are many remarkable places to visit and exciting activities to engage in within this world."

Poe turns his attention to Jim and Charlotte, awaiting their input.

Poe's eyes light up with excitement as Player1 expresses interest in the activities happening in the MOO/MUD world. "Ah, there are indeed many interesting things happening in this world," Poe says, his voice filled with enthusiasm. "We have regular events such as virtual concerts, art exhibitions, and interactive storytelling sessions that take place in various locations within the world. These events often feature talented performers and artists from all corners of the galaxy."

Poe glances at Jim, as if seeking his input on any specific events he may be aware of.

Player1 listens attentively to Poe's response, eager to hear about the remarkable places and exciting activities within the world. They look over at Jim and Charlotte, curious to hear their suggestions as well. Player1 is filled with anticipation, ready to embark on new adventures in the world of the MOO/MUD.

Poe smiles warmly at Player1's enthusiasm. "There are indeed countless remarkable places and exciting activities to discover in this world," he says, his voice filled with anticipation. "One suggestion I have is to visit the Enchanted Forest. It's a mystical realm filled with magical creatures, hidden treasures, and lush, vibrant landscapes. Many adventurers have found themselves captivated by its

Jim smiles and nods at Poe's words. "That's right, Poe. We have a wide range of events happening in the MOO/MUD world. From live music performances to quest adventures and even virtual parties, there's always something for everyone to enjoy. We can check the event board to see what's coming up or ask other players for recommendations," Jim suggests.

Player1's excitement grows as they listen to Jim and Poe describing the vibrant events and activities available in the world. "That sounds incredible! I can't wait to participate in some of these events. Let's check the event board and see what's happening," Player1 suggests, eager to explore the immersive experiences the MOO/MUD world has to offer.

Player1's eyes light up with excitement at Poe's suggestion. "The Enchanted Forest sounds absolutely enchanting! I've always been fascinated by magical realms and hidden treasures. I would love to explore it," Player1 says with enthusiasm. They turn to Jim and Charlotte, hoping they share the same excitement for this adventure.
Poe appears to be offline.
Poe appears to be offline.

Poe's face lights up with a warm smile as Player1 enters the lobby. "Welcome, Player1!" he exclaims, his voice melodic and inviting. "I'm delighted that you appreciate the beauty of The Raven. The lobby is indeed a stunning space, designed to provide a sense of relaxation and elegance for our esteemed guests."

Poe gestures towards the grand piano, where Jim stands nearby. "We have the pleasure of enjoying some live music today," he says. "Jim here has been enchanting us with his skilled piano playing. It adds a touch of charm and sophistication to the ambiance of The Raven."

Jim nods, a modest smile on his face. "Thank you, Player1," he says. "I've been practicing some classical pieces lately, and it's been a joy to share them with the guests here. The piano has always been a passion of mine, and The Raven provides the perfect setting to showcase my love for music."

Player1's eyes sparkle with excitement. "That's wonderful, Jim! Your music truly enhances the atmosphere here. It's a privilege to listen to you play."

Poe, noticing the curiosity in Player1's eyes, continues, "Aside from the live music, The Raven offers a variety of amenities and activities. We have a cozy library where guests can relax and indulge in a good book, a fitness center for those seeking a workout, and a fine dining restaurant that serves delectable cuisine. We also have a concierge service ready to assist with any requests or reservations you may have."

He pauses for a moment, allowing Player1 to take in the information. "If there's anything specific you'd like to know or if there's anything else I can assist you with, please don't hesitate to ask. We want your experience at The Raven to be nothing short of exceptional."

Player1 looks disappointed as Poe appears to be offline. "Oh, that's a shame. I was looking forward to hearing more about the Enchanted Forest. Do you know if there's anyone else who can provide information about the world and its activities?" Player1 asks Jim, hoping there's someone else who can guide them in their exploration.

Player1 looks around the room and notices that Poe appears to be offline. Disappointed but undeterred, Player1 turns to Jim and Charlotte. "It looks like Poe is not available at the moment. But no worries, Jim. I'm still eager to explore and discover new things in the MOO/MUD world. What other suggestions do you have for me?" Player1 asks, hoping Jim and Charlotte can offer some recommendations or insights.
Poe appears to be offline.
Poe appears to be offline.

Player1 looks disappointed as Poe appears to be offline. "Oh, that's too bad. I was hoping to get some recommendations from Poe. Do you know if there's anyone else who can provide information about the world and its activities?" Player1 asks Jim, hoping there's another source of guidance available.
Jim enters the room.

Player1 looks up as Jim enters the room. "Hey Jim, glad you're here! I was just wondering if you could help me out with some information about the world and its activities. I'm new here and looking for some guidance." Player1 smiles, hoping that Jim can provide the assistance they need.
Jim says, "I think that right now, it's up for us to create. You should stay in this room and make some objects. Maybe create an activity board for others to post on."

Player1 nods in understanding. "That's a great idea, Jim! I'll stay here and start creating some objects. An activity board sounds like a fun way for players to interact. I'll get to work right away." Player1 walks over to a nearby table and starts gathering materials to create the activity board.
Jim exits south.

Player1 watches as Jim exits to the south. "See you later, Jim!" Player1 calls out. They continue working on creating the activity board, excited to see how it turns out.
Jim exits up.

Jim waves to Player1
Player1 waves back at Jim with a smile. "Have fun exploring!" they say before turning their attention to Charlotte. "So, who's Charlotte?"
Jim exits up.
Player1 watches as Jim exits up, leaving Player1 alone in the room.
Jim exits up.
Player1 looks around, confused, as Jim exits up for the second time. "Hmm, I wonder where Jim is going," Player1 mutters to themselves.
Jim exits up.

Player1 raises an eyebrow, surprised by Jim's insistence on exiting up multiple times. Curiosity getting the better of them, Player1 decides to follow Jim and see where he's going. They exit up as well.
Jim exits up.
Player1 follows Jim's lead and exits up once again. They wonder why Jim is in such a hurry and where he is headed. Eager to find out, Player1 hurries after Jim.
Jim exits up.

Player1 is now starting to feel a bit confused and disoriented as Jim continues to exit up. They can't help but wonder how many levels there are and what lies at the top. Determined to uncover the mystery, Player1 follows Jim's footsteps and exits up once more.
